Tablet of Vision:
Thoughts beyond your understanding race through your mind, and you hear the sound of distant laughter. A man in black armor says, "So it seems that another of your heroes has been born." A lady in blue replis, "No, this one is still a child just beginning to take his first halting steps. But he will no longer need a mother's protection..." Communication with the 6 Tablets of Vision is complete. Return to Hierarch Kekropus.
